prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with sleek purple wings and sharp yellow eyes.
I want a bat-like creature that emits eerie sounds and glides silently through the night.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique design featuring a blend of purple and teal colors.
Make a creature that embodies agility and speed, perfect for aerial battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that can thrive in caves and forests, with a mysterious aura.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that is both Poison and Flying, showcasing its swift movements.
Show me a Pokemon that has a distinctive wing shape and captivating color scheme.
